channel.title: Paying for a unique good source
channel.description:
Heya, i'm looking for a good 317 source with perfect pking skilling and retentively slow xp rates, i would like it to have a decent economy so no shops selling godswords and rares, anti duping and multi log-in, working d claws spec, working void, ect..
You get the idea ;)
If you have a good source like this, or are coding one yourself please let me know and i will test it out and possibly buy it off you :P
Thanks,
XD

item.title: Paying for a unique good source
item.dc:creator: @Rune-Nation Rune-Nation
item.description:
@Rune-Nation wrote:

read rules before u do anything … you will get flamed and banned for rediculus things like that if you want to be a coder then make it using a blank source if you are looking to make money prostitution never fails

Read full topic
item.source: Paying for a unique good source

item.title: Paying for a unique good source
item.dc:creator: @Pure_Demons Pure Demons
item.description:
@Pure_Demons wrote:

There is no section for this junk. Haven’t you read rules? No selling/buying with the exception of SCAR scripts.

Read full topic
